description: A blue jumpsuit, with a few pockets, with a yellow zipper down the front  Provides decent storage and is not very encumbering. It's customizable for the Vault Dweller with priorities, and has a belt with pouches on it to make up for it's lack of pockets.

A blue jumpsuit, with a few pockets, with a yellow zipper down the front. Provides decent storage and is not very encumbering. It's customizable for the Vault Dweller with priorities, and has a belt with pouches on it to make up for it's lack of pockets. This one has the number 13 on the back in yellow drawn over the original vault number the suit belonged to.

A thin, blue jumpsuit, with a few pockets, with a yellow zipper down the front. Provides decent storage and is not very encumbering. It's customizable for the Vault Dweller with priorities, and has a belt with pouches on it to make up for it's lack of pockets. This one has been customized with more storage.

A thin, blue jumpsuit, with a few pockets, with a yellow zipper down the front. Provides decent storage and is not very encumbering. It's customizable for the Vault Dweller with priorities, and has a belt with pouches on it to make up for it's lack of pockets. This one has been reinforced with metal plates and has more pouches.
A thin, short-sleeved jumpsuit updated for the trans-human who needs full-body clothing.  Provides some storage and is adjustable to minimize encumbrance.

A jacket made from thick leather.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts. It looks like someone heard of the Tunnel Snakes, and drew a crude drawing of a snake contorted into an 's' on the back. The jacket makes you feel like you rule.
